statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Lethe loves eating chocolates very much. In Lethe's birthday, her good friend echo brings N boxes to her, and makes the boxes on the circle. Furthermore, echo tells Lethe that there are many chocolates in the boxes, but the total number of chocolates doesn't exceed N. Also, echo wants Lethe to displace the chocolates in such a way that in each box remains no more than one chocolate. In one move she can shift one chocolate from current box to its neighboring box. (Each box has two neighboring boxes). Can you tell Lethe the minimum number of move to achieve this goal?

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There are multi-cases (The total number of cases won't exceed 20). First line is an integer N(1<=N<=500), the total number of boxes. Then N lines follow, each line includes a number, indicates the number of chocolates in the box.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Output the minimum number of move.
